Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: temperature
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: maxTokens
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated summary.

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: model
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for summarization (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: stream
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: init(temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:)
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Initializes a new SummarizerOptions with default values for all fields.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.name: isSummarized
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.abstract: A flag indicating whether the ContextItem is a summary.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.name: tokenCount
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.abstract: The estimated token count for the text content of the ContextItem.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.name: init(text:creationDate:isSummary:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.abstract: Initializes a new ContextItem with the specified text content and optional parameters for creation date and summary status.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.name: estimateTokenCount(for:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.abstract: Helper method to estimate the token count for a given text.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.name: isOlderThan(days:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:10AuroraCore.abstract: Checks if the ContextItem is older than a specified number of days.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: items
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: A collection of ContextItem instances that make up the content of the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: bookmarks
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: A collection of Bookmark instances within the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: llmServiceVendor
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor associated with this context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: init(llmServiceVendor:creationDate:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Initializes a new Context with a unique identifier and associated LLM service information.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Adds a new bookmark to the context for a specific item.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Removes items from the context by their index set.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: getRecentItems(limit:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Retrieves the most recent N items from the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.name: summarizeItemsInRange(range:summarizer:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:10AuroraCore7Con.abstract: Summarizes a range of items within the context and replaces them with a summary item.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.name: contextItemID
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.abstract: The ID of the associated context item.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.name: label
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.abstract: A label describing the bookmark’s purpose or content.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.name: timestamp
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.abstract: The timestamp when the bookmark was created.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.name: init(contextItemID:label:)
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Bo.abstract: Initializes a new bookmark for a given context item with a specified label.

Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: text
Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Extracts and concatenates content from streaming or non-streaming responses.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: model
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: created_at
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The timestamp when the response was created.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: response
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The generated text returned by the Ollama API.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: done
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: A boolean indicating if the model has finished generating the response.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: eval_count
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The number of tokens in the generated response.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: tokenUsage
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Token usage is not provided in the Ollama API, so it’s nil.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.name: text
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Returns the generated text content from the Ollama response.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: promptTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: completionTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The number of tokens used in the completion.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: totalTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The total number of tokens used in the request.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: init(promptTokens:completionTokens:totalTokens:)
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Initializes the LLMTokenUsage with the given token counts.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: inputTokens
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: The number of input tokens processed up to this point, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: outputTokens
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: The number of output tokens generated up to this point, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The text content, if the content block represents a text response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: id
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The unique identifier of the content block, if applicable.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: name
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The name of the tool, if the content block represents a tool invocation.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: input
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The input parameters for the tool, if applicable.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: The updated text from the model, if the delta is of type text_delta.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: partialJSON
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: The updated JSON fragment, if the delta is of type input_json_delta.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: delta
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a delta (change) in the response content, such as text updates.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: contentBlock
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response, such as text or tool use.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents the usage statistics (e.g., input and output tokens) associated with this event, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: Delta
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: Represents a change (delta) in the response content, such as an update to a partial text.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: ContentBlock
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: Usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: Represents the usage statistics associated with the response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: id
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: The ID of the message returned by the Anthropic API.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: role
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: The role of the response, usually indicating it’s from the assistant.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: model
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: content
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: The content returned by the Anthropic API.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: stopReason
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: The reason why the response was stopped (optional).

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: Content
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: Nested structure to represent the content data.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: Usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: Nested structure to represent token usage data (if available).

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: Returns the concatenated text content from the Anthropic content field.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.name: tokenUsage
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:10A.abstract: Returns token usage statistics as an LLMTokenUsage object.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: topP
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Nucleus sampling parameter that limits sampling to the top percentile of tokens. Lower values narrow the scope of the sampling to the most likely tokens.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: frequencyPenalty
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: A penalty applied to reduce the repetition of the same tokens in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: presencePenalty
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: A penalty applied to encourage the introduction of new tokens into the response, promoting variety.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: stopSequences
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Sequences of tokens that signal the LLM to stop generating further tokens when encountered in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: logitBias
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: A map of token biases, allowing customization of the likelihood of specific tokens appearing in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: user
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: An optional user identifier, which can be used for tracking, moderation, or specific user-based adjustments.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: suffix
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: The suffix to add to the generated text (if applicable).

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: preferredDomains
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Preferred domains for the request, used for selecting the most suitable service during routing.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.name: init(topP:frequencyPenalty:presencePenalty:stopSequences:logitBias:user:suffix:preferredDomains:)
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequestOptions with default values for all fields.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: messages
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: An array of LLMMessage instances representing either a single prompt or a conversation history.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: temperature
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0). Higher values (e.g., 1.0) make the output more random, while lower values (e.g., 0.0) make it more deterministic.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: maxTokens
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated response.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: model
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for processing (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”, “davinci”). If not specified, the default model for the service will be used.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: stream
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: options
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Additional less commonly used configuration options to influence the behavior of the LLM.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: init(messages:temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:options:)
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequest with customizable parameters and reasonable defaults for most fields.

Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: role
Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: The role of the message sender, such as “user”, “assistant”, or “system”.

Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: content
Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: The content of the message, containing the actual text or instructions.

Structs/LLMMessage.html.name: LLMMessage
Structs/LLMMessage.html.abstract: Represents a single message within a conversation for LLM interactions.

Structs/LLMRequest.html.name: LLMRequest
Structs/LLMRequest.html.abstract: A struct representing the input to be sent to the Language Learning Model (LLM).

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: LLMRequestOptions
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: LLMRequestOptions provides a way to configure additional options for LLM requests in a structured manner.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html.name: AnthropicLLMResponse
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from Anthropic’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a streaming response from Anthropic’s LLM service.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: OllamaLLMResponse
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from Ollama’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.name: OpenAILLMResponse
Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from OpenAI’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/Bookmark.html.name: Bookmark
Structs/Bookmark.html.abstract: Represents a bookmark within the context, linking to a specific ContextItem by its ID.

Structs/Context.html.name: Context
Structs/Context.html.abstract: Represents the entire context for a conversation or task.

Structs/ContextItem.html.name: ContextItem
Structs/ContextItem.html.abstract: A representation of an individual item within a context. Each ContextItem has text content,

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: SummarizerOptions
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: SummarizerOptions provides a way to configure options specifically for summarization tasks.

Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: summarize(_:type:options:)
Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Summarizes a given piece of text using the LLM service.

Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: summarizeGroup(_:type:options:)
Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Summarizes a group of text strings using the LLM service.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: creationDate
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The timestamp for when the task was created.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: completionDate
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The timestamp for when the task was completed, if applicable.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: retryCount
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The number of times the task has been retried.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: maxRetries
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: The maximum number of retries allowed for this task.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: execute()
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Executes the task. This method can be either synchronous or asynchronous.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: markCompleted(withOutputs:)
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Marks the task as completed and sets the completion timestamp to the current time.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: resetTask()
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Resets the task to its initial pending state.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: incrementRetryCount()
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Increments the retry count for the task.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: canRetry()
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Checks whether the task can still be retried.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.name: hasRequiredInputs()
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Checks if the task has all required inputs.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: tasks
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: The collection of tasks within this workflow.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: tryMarkCompleted()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Attempts to mark the workflow as completed.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: markStopped()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Updates the state of the workflow to stopped.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: markFailed(retryCount:)
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Updates the state of the workflow to failed.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: isCompleted()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Helper method to check if the workflow is completed.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: resetWorkflow()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Resets the workflow to its initial state.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: addTask(_:)
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Adds a new task to the workflow.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: updateTask(_:at:)
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Updates a task at a given index in the workflow.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: evaluateState()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Evaluates the state of the workflow based on the status of its tasks.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: activeTasks()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Returns an array of tasks that are currently active (pending or in progress).

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.name: completedTasks()
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: Returns an array of tasks that have been completed.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: workflow
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: The workflow that the manager will execute.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: start()
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Starts the workflow execution by triggering the first or current task and proceeds sequentially.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: evaluateState()
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Evaluates and updates the current state of the workflow based on the status of its tasks.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: stopWorkflow()
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Stops the workflow by marking it as stopped.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: getCurrentTaskIndex()
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Retrieves the current task index in the workflow.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: executeCurrentTask()
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Executes the current task in the workflow, checks required inputs, and updates the task state.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: completeTask(_:)
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Completes the current task and progresses to the next task if available.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.name: handleTaskFailure(for:)
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html#/.abstract: Handles a task failure and determines whether to retry the task or stop the workflow.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:10.name: vendor
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:10.abstract: The vendor of the LLM service, if available.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:10.name: model
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:10.abstract: The model used to generate the text, if available.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: vendor
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor (e.g., “OpenAI”, “Anthropic”, “Ollama”).

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: name
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: apiKey
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The API key or authentication token required to interact with the LLM service.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: requiresAPIKey
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Not all LLM services require an API key for authentication. This property indicates whether the service requires one.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: contextWindowSize
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: maxOutputTokens
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: inputTokenPolicy
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: outputTokenPolicy
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: systemPrompt
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: sendRequest(_:)
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously and returns the response.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:10A.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously with support for streaming.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html.name: LLMServiceProtocol
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html.abstract: The LLMServiceProtocol defines the interface for interacting with different LLM (Language Learning Model) services.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html.name: LLMResponseProtocol
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol that defines a common interface for the response of different LLM services.

Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html.name: WorkflowManagerProtocol
Protocols/WorkflowManagerProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol defining the essential properties and behaviors of a workflow manager, responsible for executing and managing workflows.

Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html.name: WorkflowProtocol
Protocols/WorkflowProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol defining the essential properties and behaviors of a workflow, responsible for executing and managing tasks.

Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html.name: WorkflowTaskProtocol
Protocols/WorkflowTaskProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol defining the essential properties and behaviors of a task within a workflow system.

Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html.name: SummarizerProtocol
Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html.abstract: The SummarizerProtocol defines methods for summarizing content via an LLM service.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.name: estimatedTokenCount()
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.abstract: Estimates the token count for a given string.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.name: isWithinTokenLimit(context:tokenLimit:buffer:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.abstract: Checks if the combined token count of the string and an optional context is within the allowed token limit, considering the buffer.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.name: trimmedToFit(tokenLimit:buffer:strategy:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS10AuroraCore.abstract: Trims the string according to the specified trimming strategy.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:10Au.name: adjustToServiceLimits
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:10Au.abstract: Automatically adjusts the token limits to match the service’s constraints.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:10Au.name: strictRequestLimits
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:10Au.abstract: Strictly enforces the token limits defined in the request.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: missingAPIKey
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Error thrown when the API key is missing for a service that requires authentication.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: invalidResponse(statusCode:)
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Error thrown when the response from the API is invalid, typically due to an unexpected status code.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: decodingError
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Error thrown when the service encounters an issue decoding the response data.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: invalidURL
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Error thrown when the constructed or provided URL is invalid.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: custom(message:)
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Custom error type for providing more descriptive error messages.

Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:10AuroraCore7LLMRo.name: rawValue
Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:10AuroraCore7LLMRo.abstract: Returns the string value of the role, either predefined or custom.

Enums/LLMRole.html.name: LLMRole
Enums/LLMRole.html.abstract: Represents the role of a message sender within a conversation.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html.name: LLMServiceError
Enums/LLMServiceError.html.abstract: LLMServiceError defines a set of error types that can occur while interacting with LLM services.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html.name: TokenAdjustmentPolicy
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html.abstract: The TokenAdjustmentPolicy enum specifies how input and output token limits are handled for an LLM service.

Enums/WorkflowState.html.name: WorkflowState
Enums/WorkflowState.html.abstract: WorkflowState represents the various states a workflow can be in during its lifecycle.

Enums/TaskStatus.html.name: TaskStatus
Enums/TaskStatus.html.abstract: An enumeration representing the various statuses that a task can have within its lifecycle.

Enums/SummaryType.html.name: SummaryType
Enums/SummaryType.html.abstract: Enum representing different types of summaries that can be requested.

Classes/TrimmingTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.name: init(string:tokenLimit:buffer:strategy:)
Classes/TrimmingTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.abstract: Convenience initializer for creating a TrimmingTask to trim a single string.

Classes/SummarizeTask.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: execute()
Classes/SummarizeTask.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Executes the summarization task, summarizing the context items and storing the result.

Classes/SummarizeTask.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: execute(with:)
Classes/SummarizeTask.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Executes the summarization task with options, summarizing the context items and storing the result.

Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.name: init(context:filename:)
Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.abstract: Initializes a SaveContextTask with the context and filename.

Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.name: execute()
Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.abstract: Executes the SaveContextTask by encoding the context and writing it to disk.

Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.name: init(filename:)
Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.abstract: Initializes a LoadContextTask with the ability to load a context from disk.

Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.name: execute()
Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:10Aurora.abstract: Executes the task by loading the context from the specified file or a default file.

Classes/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:10Auro.name: init(filenames:)
Classes/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Initializes a FetchContextsTask with an optional list of filenames.

Classes/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:10Auro.name: execute()
Classes/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Executes the task, fetching the specified contexts from the disk.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: saveAPIKey(_:for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Saves an API key to the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: getAPIKey(for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Retrieves an API key from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: deleteAPIKey(for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Deletes an API key from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: saveBaseURL(_:for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Saves the base URL to the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: getBaseURL(for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Retrieves the base URL from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: deleteBaseURL(for:)
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Deletes the base URL from the secure storage (Keychain) for a specific service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: clearAll()
Classes/SecureStorage.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Clears all API keys and base URLs from the secure storage (Keychain).

Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: init(llmService:)
Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Initializes a new Summarizer instance with the specified LLM service.

Classes/WorkflowTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.name: init(name:description:inputs:maxRetries:status:)
Classes/WorkflowTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.abstract: Initializes a new WorkflowTask with a specified name, description, and inputs.

Classes/WorkflowTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.name: markCompleted(withOutputs:)
Classes/WorkflowTask.html#/s:10AuroraCor.abstract: Marks the LLMTask as completed and stores the response from the LLM service.

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.name: init(name:description:tasks:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.abstract: Initializes a new workflow with a specified name, description, and tasks.

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.name: updateTask(_:at:)
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.abstract: Updates a task at a given index in the workflow.

Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.name: executeNextTask()
Classes/Workflow.html#/s:10AuroraCore8Wo.abstract: Executes the next task in the workflow that is in the pending state.

Classes/WorkflowManager.html#/s:10Aurora.name: init(workflow:)
Classes/WorkflowManager.html#/s:10Aurora.abstract: Initializes the workflow manager with a specific workflow.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.name: addNewContext(_:llmService:summarizer:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.abstract: Adds a new context to the manager and returns the unique identifier of the new context.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.name: setActiveContext(withID:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.abstract: Sets the active context by its ID.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.name: getContextController(for:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.abstract: Retrieves a ContextController for a given context ID.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.name: summarizeOlderContexts()
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.abstract: Summarizes older context items across all managed ContextController instances.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.name: loadAllContexts()
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:10AuroraC.abstract: Loads all contexts from disk and restores them as ContextController instances.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: updateLLMService(_:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Updates the LLM service used by the ContextController.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Adds a bookmark to the context for a specific item.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Removes items from the context based on their offsets.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: updateItem(_:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Updates an existing item in the context.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: summarizeOlderContext(daysThreshold:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Summarizes older context items based on a given age threshold.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: fullHistory()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Retrieves the full history of context items.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: getItems()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Exposes the context items for testing purposes.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.name: getContext()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Exposes the underlying context for testing or external use.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: vendor
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: name
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: baseURL
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The base url for the OpenAI API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: apiKey
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The API key used for authenticating requests to the OpenAI API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: OpenAI requires an API key for authentication.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 128k.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: systemPrompt
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Initializes a new OpenAIService instance with the given API key.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously without streaming.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously with streaming support.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: vendor
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: name
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: baseURL
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The base URL for the Ollama API (e.g., http://localhost:11434).

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: apiKey
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Not required for Ollama but included to satisfy the protocol

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Ollama does not require an API key for authentication.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: systemPrompt
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:10AuroraCo.abstract: Sends a streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves partial responses asynchronously.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: vendor
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: name
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: apiKey
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The API key used for authenticating requests to the Anthropic API.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Anthropic requires an API key for authentication.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 200k.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: systemPrompt
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Initializes a new AnthropicService instance with the given API key and token limit.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:10Auror.abstract: Sends a request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/LLMTask.html#/s:10AuroraCore7LLM.name: execute()
Classes/LLMTask.html#/s:10AuroraCore7LLM.abstract: Executes the LLMTask by sending the prompt to the connected LLM service.

Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html#/s:10Auro.name: createService(for:)
Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html#/s:10Auro.abstract: Creates and returns an LLM service for the given context based on the service name.

Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html#/s:10Aur.name: description
Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html#/s:10Aur.abstract: A human-readable description of each routing strategy.

Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html.name: Routing
Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html.abstract: Routing options for selecting an appropriate LLM service.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: registerDomainRoutingService(_:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Registers a new domain routing service or replaces an existing one.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: registerFallbackService(_:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Registers a new fallback LLM service or replaces an existing one.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: registerService(_:withRoutings:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Registers a new LLM service or replaces an existing one with the same name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: unregisterService(withName:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Unregisters an LLM service with a specified name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: setActiveService(byName:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Sets the active LLM service by its registered name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: routeRequest(_:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Routes a request to an appropriate LLM service based on the presence of a domain routing service and registered routings.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: sendRequest(_:routings:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Sends a request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:routings:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:10AuroraCore1.abstract: Sends a streaming request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

Classes/LLMManager.html.name: LLMManager
Classes/LLMManager.html.abstract: LLMManager is responsible for managing multiple LLM services and routing requests to the appropriate service based on the specified criteria.

Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.name: LLMServiceFactory
Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.abstract: LLMServiceFactory is responsible for creating instances of LLM services like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama.

Classes/LLMTask.html.name: LLMTask
Classes/LLMTask.html.abstract: The LLMTask class represents a workflow task that sends a prompt to a Language Learning Model (LLM) service

Classes/AnthropicService.html.name: AnthropicService
Classes/AnthropicService.html.abstract: AnthropicService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Anthropic API.

Classes/OllamaService.html.name: OllamaService
Classes/OllamaService.html.abstract: OllamaService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Ollama models via its API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html.name: OpenAIService
Classes/OpenAIService.html.abstract: OpenAIService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the OpenAI API.

Classes/ContextController.html.name: ContextController
Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: ContextController manages the state and operations related to a specific Context, including adding, removing, and updating items, as well as summarizing older items. The controller handles context-specific summarization using a connected LLM service.

Classes/ContextManager.html.name: ContextManager
Classes/ContextManager.html.abstract: ContextManager is responsible for managing multiple ContextController instances.

Classes/WorkflowManager.html.name: WorkflowManager
Classes/WorkflowManager.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of the WorkflowManager protocol, responsible for managing and executing a workflow.

Classes/Workflow.html.name: Workflow
Classes/Workflow.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of the WorkflowProtocol, responsible for executing and managing tasks in a workflow.

Classes/WorkflowTask.html.name: WorkflowTask
Classes/WorkflowTask.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of the Task protocol, representing a task within a workflow system.

Classes/Summarizer.html.name: Summarizer
Classes/Summarizer.html.abstract: The Summarizer class provides an implementation of the SummarizerProtocol, delegating all summarization tasks to an LLM service.

Classes/SecureStorage.html.name: SecureStorage
Classes/SecureStorage.html.abstract: SecureStorage is responsible for securely saving, retrieving, and deleting API keys and base URLs using the Keychain on Apple devices.

Classes/FetchContextsTask.html.name: FetchContextsTask
Classes/FetchContextsTask.html.abstract: FetchContextsTask is responsible for retrieving a list of stored contexts from the disk.

Classes/LoadContextTask.html.name: LoadContextTask
Classes/LoadContextTask.html.abstract: LoadContextTask is responsible for loading a Context object from disk.

Classes/SaveContextTask.html.name: SaveContextTask
Classes/SaveContextTask.html.abstract: SaveContextTask is responsible for saving a Context object to disk.

Classes/SummarizeTask.html.name: SummarizeTask
Classes/SummarizeTask.html.abstract: SummarizeTask is responsible for summarizing context items within a ContextController using the connected LLM service.
